title: Build Creative Request
description: Request parameters for building creative assets using AI-powered creative generation

message.description: Natural language description of the creative brief or requirements

source_format_id.description: Format ID of existing creative to transform (optional - omit when creating from scratch)

target_format_id.description: Format ID to generate. The format definition specifies whether output is manifest-based or code-based.

assets.description: Available assets to use in creative generation - this is where promoted_offerings should be included as an asset
